      • getSelectedObject

        protected Object getSelectedObject(List<nl.tudelft.simulation.dsol.animation.Locatable> targets)
        edits a selected Renderable2D.
        Parameters:
        targets - which are selected by the mouse.
        Returns:
        the selected Object (e.g. the one with the highest zValue).
